title: Understanding ICD
text: The International Classification of Diseases (ICD) is a globally recognized system. It is used for classifying and coding various health-related conditions.

hintAnswer: a standardized system used globally for classifying and coding diseases, disorders, injuries, and other $$health-related$$ conditions
title: Purpose of ICD
text: What is the primary purpose of the International Classification of Diseases (ICD)?
choices: a standardized system used globally for classifying and coding diseases, disorders, injuries, and other $$health-related$$ conditions
an assessment tool used by mental health professionals to analyze an individual’s cognitive, emotional, and behavioral functioning
a system used nationally for classifying and coding diseases, disorders, injuries, and other $$health-related$$ conditions
an assessment tool used by students to analyze an individual’s cognitive, emotional, and behavioral functioning
